title: Publish Draft Version 26 for testing

requirements.text: Publish (run) Draft Version 26 so it becomes the active preview build available for testing via the standard preview link.
acceptanceCriteria: Draft Version 26 is published and becomes the currently running preview build.
The standard preview URL (e.g., https://caffeine.icp.xyz/preview) opens the app running Draft Version 26.

nonGoals: Do not implement new features or UI changes as part of this request.
Do not modify backend canister logic or frontend code; this is a publish/run action only.
